00016 /* General definition of the Atmel Generic record specifications. */
00017 enum _AtmelGenericDefinitions {
00018         /* 16 should be plenty of space to read in an Atmel Generic record (11 bytes in reality) */
00019         ATMEL_GENERIC_RECORD_BUFF_SIZE = 16,
00020         /* Offsets and lengths of various fields in an Atmel Generic record */
00021         ATMEL_GENERIC_ADDRESS_LEN = 6,
00022         ATMEL_GENERIC_DATA_LEN = 4,
00023         /* The separator character, a colon, that separates the data and address fields in the Atmel Generic records */
00024         ATMEL_GENERIC_SEPARATOR_OFFSET = 6,
00025         ATMEL_GENERIC_SEPARATOR = ':',
00026 };
